org.jerkar.api.depmanagement
Class JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentModuleDepBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkDependencies.Builder
      org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentScopeableBuilder
          org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentModuleDepBuilder
Enclosing class:
JkDependencies.Builder
public static final class JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentModuleDepBuilder
extends JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentScopeableBuilder

Returned type after an addition of a JkModuleDependency. This type allows to chain redefinition of scope, scope mapping, transitivity and exclusions.
